assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Semitronix Corporation provides characterization and yield improvement solutions for the semiconductor industry worldwide. It offers SmtCell, a parameterized cell building tool that creates parameterized testing keys; TCMagic, a test chip design platform, which provides layout automation, automatic place and routing, design documentation, and testing program generation services; and ATCompiler, an addressable test chip design platform, which include full layout automation, test-key generation, place and routing, design simulation and verification, design documentation, and testing program generation products. The company also provide DataExp, a WAT and test chip data analyzing tool for data filtering and selection operations, and plotting and auto-report functions; WAT Tester, which enables engineers to reduce the test time for measurements in advanced semiconductor wafer manufacturing processes; and ICSpider that design the flow developed to streamline the test-chip design and optimization for product diagnostics. Its products applications include test key design automation, process development, mass production process monitoring, and process evaluation for the design house. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
